channel.title: Art on Jaka Pribošek
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Jaka Pribošek

item.title: Centrifugal Casting Machine
item.description: This mad-max style centrifugal machine was built entirely out of various scrap I had lying around. At a heart of the machine is a front flange of an old induction motor and the corresponding motor shaft. The shaft is clamped in the vice, so the bearing can spin around freely. To the flange, the bowl, retrieved from an old hot-water tank, is mounted and the metal arm, holding the casting mould and the counterweight.

item.title: Coffe Cup
item.description: The idea for this project is pretty old and roots back to 2014. I decided to build a special shaped coffe cup, looking classic on the outside, but revealing its secret heart as the coffe level drops to half. What started as a simple birthday gift for my girlfriend, ended up as a 6 years long journey of ups and down,with some extraordinary long pauses as I did not know how to proceed.
